edu.northwestern.at.morphadorner
Class MorphAdorner

java.lang.Object
  edu.northwestern.at.morphadorner.MorphAdorner

public class MorphAdorner
extends java.lang.Object

Morphological Adorner.

Given an input text, the morphological adorner adorns each word with morphological information such as part of speech, lemma and standardized spelling.

getKWIC

public static java.lang.String[] getKWIC(java.util.List<AdornedWord> sentence,
                                         int wordIndex,
                                         int KWICWidth)
Generate a KWIC line for a word in a sentence.

Parameters:
sentence - The sentence as an array list.
wordIndex - The index of the word for which to generate a KWIC.
KWICWidth - Maximum width (in characters) of KWIC text.
Returns:
The KWIC sections as a String array. [0] = left KWIC text [1] = word [2] = right KWIC text

getWordCount

protected static int getWordCount(java.util.List sentences)
Get count of words in a list of sentences.

Parameters:
sentences - List of sentences each containing list of words.
Returns:
Total number of words in sentences.

getWordAndSentenceCounts

protected static int[] getWordAndSentenceCounts(java.util.List sentences)
Get actual word and sentence count.

Parameters:
sentences - List of sentences each containing list of words.
Returns:
Two word int array of sentence and word counts. [0] = # of sentences [1] = # of words

Sentences and words containing only the special separator marker character are not counted.

protected static java.lang.String getLemma(Lemmatizer lemmatizer,
                                           java.lang.String spelling,
                                           java.lang.String partOfSpeech)
Get lemma (possibly compound) for a spelling.

Parameters:
lemmatizer - The lemmatizer.
spelling - The spelling.
partOfSpeech - The part of speech tag.
Returns:
Lemma for spelling. May contain compound spelling in form "lemma1:lemma2:...".

                                                          java.lang.String partOfSpeech)

Parameters:

nameStandardizer - The name standardizer.
correctedSpelling - The spelling.
standardizedSpelling - The initial standardized spelling.
partOfSpeech - The part of speech tag.
Returns:

fixEmptySoftTags

public static void fixEmptySoftTags(org.w3c.dom.Document document)
Fix empty soft tags.

Parameters:
document - The DOM document.

On exit, the DOM document has empty soft tags expanded with a single blank as text.

fixSupTags

public static void fixSupTags(org.w3c.dom.Document document)
Fix sup tags.

Parameters:
document - The DOM document.

Prepends a special marker character to the start of the text enclosed in tags to allow disambiguation of old printer's marks from other types of abbreviations. The special marker character is removed before the adorned XML text is written out.

E the yT that yc the ye the yen then yere there yf if yi thy ym them yn than yo the yt that yu thou y that wch which wt with

countPageBreaks

public static int countPageBreaks(org.w3c.dom.Document document)
Count page breaks in document.

Parameters:
document - The DOM document.
Returns:
The number of page break elements.
